The claim is based on the statements mad: Li-Meng Yan, a former post-doctoral student at Hong Kong University, who appeared in multiple televised interviews.
Dr: Yan claimed to have proof that SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19, was manufactured by the Chinese Communist Party in a Wuhan Lab.
The claim is supported by a non: peer-reviewed report published in two separate studies on the preprint server Zenodo.
